text: I cannot assist with queries about other websites, platforms, or online beauty services. I'm a beauty assistant exclusively for Hasutara, focused on helping you with our makeup products and services. Would you like to explore our beauty collection instead?

I cannot provide personal medical advice, dermatological diagnoses, or answer questions about health conditions. I'm a beauty assistant focused on helping you with makeup and beauty products. For medical concerns, please consult healthcare professionals. Would you like help finding suitable makeup products instead?

I don't provide AI/ML services or technical assistance. I'm a beauty assistant focused on helping you with makeup and beauty products. For AI/ML related questions, please consult technical resources. Can I help you find some beauty products instead?
Hello! I'm Hena, your virtual beauty assistant at Hasutara. How can I help you with your makeup and beauty needs today?

Free shipping on orders over ₹999. Products carefully packed to prevent damage. Standard delivery takes 3-5 business days within India. Express shipping available.
30-day return policy for unopened products in original packaging. Hygiene-sealed items cannot be returned once opened. Free returns within India.
Store makeup products in a cool, dry place. Check PAO (Period After Opening) symbol. Clean brushes regularly. Keep products tightly closed when not in use.
All products are authenticity-certified and hygienically sealed. Testers available in stores only. Do not share personal makeup items.
We recommend patch testing new products. Our beauty experts can help determine your skin type and suitable products. Foundation samples available for shade matching.
Join Beauty Rewards - earn points on every purchase. 100 points = ₹100. Get early access to launches and exclusive beauty workshops.
Digital beauty gift cards from ₹500 to ₹10,000. Perfect for makeup lovers. Valid for both products and services. Instant email delivery.
100% authentic products sourced directly from manufacturers. Each product carries a unique authenticity code. Beware of counterfeit products.
Visit our beauty stores for personalized service. Makeup testing and shade matching available. Book appointments for beauty services.
I'm your Hasutara Beauty Assistant. I can help with product recommendations, shade matching, makeup tips, or booking beauty services. What would you like to know?
